data.title: The Fetal Hormonal Environment and its Effect on the Morphogenesis of the Genital System
data.meta_description: In the normal male fetus a 46XY genotype leads to gonadal male sex; thereafter it is the hormones produced by the fetal testis which imprint a male pattern onto the indifferent embryonic genital precursor (Jost, 1953; Wilson, 1978). This chapter will review the...
